main event: A UFO was observed on ground radar at 4:30 PM in Uniontown, PA, on 14th September 1958, estimated to be moving at a speed of 700 MPH. The object was round and white, and it moved off the radar scope.
interesting points: The UFO was seen on ground radar, indicating it was tracked by military equipment.
It was estimated to be moving at a high speed of 700 MPH, which is unusual for conventional aircraft of that time.
The object was described as round, the size of a basketball, and with a slight glow outside.
There were attempts to clarify the sighting by requesting information on the flight path, weather conditions, and directions at the time of the sighting.
Another sighting over Rostraver Township, PA, and the inability to ascertain information about the UFO from the persons who reported it raise further intrigue.
sighted object: round, white UFO on ground radar
